评论概述: Floral Lace Long Sleeve Shrug and matching Tube Top
评论详情: I love this little set! Mostly because I never liked the way tube tops look on me. With this I can wear the shrug and not feel like I am half naked! This fit me pretty good considering I ordered a size smaller than I normally would. It stays up and doesn't slide all over the place. Washing was easy I didn't dry it in the dryer however, I never dry lace as a rule and that eliminates many problems others find with lace products. I definitely want to get more of them in different colors! Definitely recommend!
This fit me very good and the quality is good for the price
I love the way this looks on me! The medium is form fitting, but not too tight. Go with your usual size if ordering.

This top is beautiful! It's a strapless tube top that comes with a floral bolero shrug that's separate. I do recommend sizing down because the tube top is pretty stretchy. The quality of the shirt is great and it feels nice wearing it on. Pairing this with a white skirt would make a super cute outfit!

I was looking for some cute going out tops and this is one of my new favorite pieces. It is two pieces consisting of the tube top and then the long sleeve. The tube top is super cute and the material is high quality. I ordered a size small and it stayed up with no slipping. The sheer floral design is super cute and it is not see through. The long sleeve part is see through but I love it. It is also a sheer floral design and it stays up around my shoulders very well. This can be worn with or without the long sleeve section and it is overall such a cute set.

This is a nice set.  Looks very nice on my wife.Small problem is, that the sleeves are a bit small, in comparison to the shirt part.  They are not connected, so you can mix and match the pieces with different outfits, if you so choose.  But, as I said, the sleeves are a little bit too small.  She is still able to get them on, but it is a little challenging.The shirt part fits well, though, and it really looks nice on her.Quality of material is decent.  Stitching is good, and the lace of the sleeves seems high quality.  Held up to washing, and did not have any issues.  No fading, bleeding of the colors, or anything like that.
